item.title: Pot hole on bend heading north, 28th May
item.description:
Pot hole on bend as you head north Of note the road between the Old bath rd junction & Charlton lane heading north to East Glos tennis club is poor & could really do with resurfacing vice patching
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 149, Old Bath Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish and recycling constantly left out on wrong days, 28th May
item.description:
This is post bin collection on Tuesday 28 May outside 14 and 15 Granville Street. This means the bin bags will be there for another two weeks at least (I don't know if they were out before the refuse people came today) yesterday there was rubbish from ripped bags strewn across the pavement, which I cleaned up. The path is blocked by the amount of stuff left outside and rubbish across the path so it's difficult for wheelchairs, prams and visually impaired people to pass. Can a reminder be sent to these residents please about appropriate refuse and recycling arrangements, and to clean up if their bags split.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Granville Street, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Driving along the A435 at Bishops Cleve, heading towards Evesham, today the 28th May at 12:09, outside a small building site, there is a large sunken drain that felt on impact, felt like a loud bang as the car hit the hole at approximately 45-50mph. The sunken drain has left quite a deep hole and I think this is not only dangerous to other motorists but also cyclists and motorcyclists, as could result in the rider coming off their bike. I attempted to avoid the sunken drain but this wasn’t possible due to on coming traffic and parked builders vans straddling the pavement and the road adjacent to the sunken drain., 28th May
item.description:
The photo's attached show the sunken drain, which is just before "Stollards Close" , with Stollards Close being on the left, heading towards Evesham. I believe this would be what three words location close to the problem is "smiled.behind.banana".

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous potholes on this stretch of road and edges of road are bad for cyclists, 28th May
item.description:
Crevices along edge of road making it very dangerous for cyclists when a car passes them and they have to move close to the verge. Numerous potholes which could damage my car! Whole road is in a mess. From Whittington to the junction to go to Cleeve Common and then down to Battledown.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
